data.title: GE Appliances Careers
data.text:
Welcome! I'm glad you're here

If you're interested in joining GE Appliances, I want to share a few things about working here that make me proud.

We're creators, thinkers and makers who believe that anything is possible and that there's always a better way. GE Appliances believes in giving our people the freedom to explore, discover and build good things, together.

Here, creativity meets passion and conversations lead to better outcomes and experiences. GE Appliances is a place where everyone has a voice and is encouraged to ask "why" and "what if."

We work together to invent, design, make, deliver and service "good things, for life." We invite you to join us.

Sincerely,

Kevin Nolan

President & CEO

GE Appliances, a Haier company

Disability accommodations in the application process

GE Appliances invites all interested and qualified candidates to apply for employment opportunities. If you have a disability that prevents or limits your ability to use or access the site or require any other accommodation in the application process due to a disability, you may request a reasonable accommodation.

To make an accommodation request, please contact our recruiting team at ask.recruiting@geappliances.com, and we will be happy to assist you.
